definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)
decoration/ornament/to decorate/to adorn/to hide/to conceal (a fault)/excuse (to hide a fault)/to play a role (in opera)/to impersonate

sentences.english: Memorize a lot of hesitation and qualifying phrases.
sentences.chinese: 背一些猶豫時使用的詞和修飾語。

sentences.english: I circle a misplaced modifier and wait as they make the fix.
sentences.chinese: 我會圈出用錯的修飾語，等他們自己修改。

sentences.english: And , with the added epithet , II Chron.
sentences.chinese: 並與增加修飾語，二專欄。

sentences.english: Ambiguity caused by improper use of modifier is a common linguistics phenomenon in English.
sentences.chinese: 修飾語引起歧義是英語中常見的語言現象。
